Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Skokie. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
